why: We need a way to track our progress collecting, processing and improving planning data. Once tracked it will be easier to report on progress and prioritise what to do next.
questions: What datasets do we have data for?
What datasets do we have no data for?
What datasets do we know about?
How much data do we have for each dataset?
How trustworthy is the data? (How to measure?)
How quickly did we get data?
How good are we at getting data?

qs.question: What datasets do we have data for?
qs.how: If we have collected resources for a dataset and extracted data from them then we can say we have data for it. On the dashbaord page we display the total number of resource collected for a given dataset.
